description: Ezra is on a mission to detect cancer early for everyone by offering a full body MRI scan of up to 13 organs. We are developing screening technologies using artificial intelligence to make our process more accurate, faster and cheaper.
name: Ezra
tagline: Detecting cancer early using Full Body MRIs

similar_companies.name: Healthier Capital
similar_companies.industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals

updates.text:
We're excited to introduce the Ezra Blueprint Scan—the most advanced full body scan available today.

Designed in partnership with Bryan Johnson, leveraging his pioneering longevity protocols, Ezra Blueprint combines cutting-edge MRI, CT, and AI technology to provide an unprecedented view of your health. From assessing your body composition to understanding brain age and coronary health, Ezra Blueprint delivers deep, actionable insights to help you take control of your wellness.

We're proud to launch Ezra Blueprint at select partner facilities across Los Angeles, New York City, New Jersey, Miami, Austin, and Orange County.
Be among the first to experience this innovation in preventive health. To learn more or book your scan, click the link below www.ezra.com/blueprint/
Thrilled that Ezra has been selected as one of the most promising startups of 2024 by Business Insider. Let’s save more lives!
Another milestone for the team and our community at Ezra AI. Thanks everyone for your support along the way!

Did you know that over 66,000 people are diagnosed with head and neck cancer in the US each year? As we observe Head and Neck Cancer Awareness Month this month, let’s shine a spotlight on this under-discussed cancer type.

Head and neck cancers include various types, with the most common affecting the squamous cells in surfaces that line the head and neck, such as the mouth, throat, and voice box. These cancers may impact salivary glands, sinuses, muscles, and nerves in the head and neck, each type identified by the specific part of the body affected.

Heavy and frequent alcohol consumption and tobacco use (including cigarettes, cigars, pipes, and chewing tobacco) are significant risk factors for head and neck cancers. About 70-80 percent of head and neck cases are directly linked to tobacco use.

Let’s raise awareness about the importance of early detection and advocate for accessible screenings together.

Learn more about head and neck cancers here: https://lnkd.in/esAdy_QJ

#EarlyDetection #AccessibleScreenings #MoreLife #Cancer

Passionate about early cancer detection? Join Ezra, where we are committed to transforming the landscape of medical care. Or if you know anyone who might be interested, please let us know!

#EzraHealth #HealthcareHeroes #EarlyCancerDetection #JoinOurTeam #Hiring

As a single mom and registered nurse, Janette has witnessed the impact of late diagnoses. Motivated to take control of her health, she underwent a Full Body Ezra scan. The results transformed her life, leading to a 26 lbs weight loss and resolving her sleep apnea, eliminating the need for a CPAP machine.
Discover Janette's inspiring story and the importance of proactive health screenings at ezra.com/community
